#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("%d\n",(n/2)+(n/4)+(n/8)+(n/16)+(n/32)+(n/64)+(n/128)+(n/256));
        printf("%d\n",(n/3)+(n/9)+(n/27)+(n/81)+(n/243));
        printf("%d\n",(n/5)+(n/25)+(n/125));
    }
    return 0;
}
